Binary: lirc, lirc-doc, liblirc0, liblircclient0, liblircclient-dev, liblirc-dev, liblirc-client0, lirc-x
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-exec, dh-python, doxygen, expect [!hurd-any], kmod [linux-any], libasound2-dev [linux-any kfreebsd-any], libftdi1-dev, libpython3-dev (>= 3.5), libsystemd-dev [linux-any], libudev-dev [linux-any], libusb-1.0-0-dev [!kfreebsd-any], libusb-dev [!kfreebsd-any], libx11-dev, man2html-base, pkg-config, portaudio19-dev, python3-dev:any (>= 3.5), python3-setuptools, python3-yaml:native, socat [!hurd-any], systemd [linux-any], xsltproc
Package-List: liblirc-client0 deb libs optional arch=any liblirc-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any liblirc0 deb libs optional arch=any liblircclient-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any liblircclient0 deb libs optional arch=any lirc deb utils optional arch=any lirc-doc deb doc optional arch=all lirc-x deb utils optional arch=any
